item.description:
Please join us for a rally at 5:30pm in front of the Whittemore center. Park in lot A.

Tickets are available still. Just go to http://www.nhgop.org/..., and enter sponsor code 018RP3 (along with all of the other required information). You'll be in, at no expense, for the full program--so come on out and clap for Dr. Paul.

For those with tickets: the pre-debate Reception is from 6 to 8 at the Lundholm Gym and you can pick up your tickets at the will-call counter there. There will be another will-call counter at the Whittemore Center which will be open from 7 to 8:30. The doors will close at 8:30 so you must be there before then. The debate begins at 9 and ends at 10:30. Remember to bring a picture ID with you to pick up your tickets.

The NH Debate will be held Sept 5th at the Whittemore Center at UNH.
item.name: NH GOP Rally & Debate
